mapper.select: SELECT travelid, uname, COALESCE (fare,0) as fare, COALESCE (expenses,0) as expenses, to_char(TO_TIMESTAMP(orgtime/1000), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as orgtime, to_char(TO_TIMESTAMP(endtime/1000), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as endtime, COALESCE (trip,'') as trip, addtime, adduid, aptype, COALESCE (ccuid,'') as ccuid, COALESCE ("sum",0) as "sum", COALESCE (rebversion,'') as rebversion, rebstatus from tb_travel_record where aptype = '2' and (rebversion != null or rebversion !='') and rebstatus !='4' and uid=#{uid} and travelid = #{travelid} and orgtime >= #{orgtime} and endtime <= #{endtime} limit #{pagesize} offset #{pageno}

SELECT trim(deid) as deid, travelid, trim(uid) as uid, trim(cid) as cid, COALESCE(projectid,'') as projectid, trim(did) as did, COALESCE(trpeers,'') as trpeers, COALESCE(trdefense,'') as trdefense, trtime, COALESCE(trtype,'') as trtype, COALESCE(trregion,'') as trregion, COALESCE(trgoal,'') as trgoal, COALESCE(trip,'') as trip, COALESCE(produce,0) as produce, COALESCE(fare,0) as fare, COALESCE(expenses,0) as expenses, COALESCE(amount,0) as amount, addtime, adduid, updtime, upduid, status, COALESCE(summary,'') as summary from tb_travel_record_deta where status='1' and uid = #{uid} and cid = #{cid} and travelid = #{travelid} and deid = #{deid} and orgtime >= #{orgtime} and endtime <= #{endtime} order by trtime desc limit #{pagesize} offset #{pageno}
